poem:
Title: "In the Vein of Veracity"

A rising tide of falsehood, AI-born,
Threatens to cloak our world in mistruth's morn.
Elections at risk, economics scorn,
In data's shroud, trust and truth are torn.
Realities twisted, perceptions forlorn,
WEF warned, yet no oath has been sworn.
Heed the cry: In authentic voice, we adorn,
To ensure from fake news, no future is worn.
